name: MarkdownCodeblock

text.description: STRING! don't put a JSON object here,  first use JSON.stringify!

minimalMode.description: If set, this is the mode when minimised

expandedMode.description: If set, this is the mode when expanded

isInitiallyExpanded.description: if true, by default it's expanded

isModeStatic.description: if true, mode cannot be changed

schema.fullComment: STRING! don't put a JSON object here,  first use JSON.stringify!
If set, this is the mode when minimised
If set, this is the mode when expanded
if true, by default it's expanded
if true, mode cannot be changed

description: Renders a markdown codeblock with a text as content and an optional extension
